CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing International Customers relative to Urban Shoppers?
SRP.A: International Customers is {below} Urban Shoppers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Subscription Members relative to Urban Shoppers?
SRP.A: Subscription Members is {above} Urban Shoppers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Urban Shoppers relative to Luxury Consumers?
SRP.A: Urban Shoppers is {below} Luxury Consumers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total online sales volume?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {International Customers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total online sales volume?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Urban Shoppers}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Urban Shoppers's maximum Online Sales Volume in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Urban Shoppers's maximum Online Sales Volume is in {1984}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Subscription Members's maximum Online Sales Volume in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Subscription Members's maximum Online Sales Volume is in {1983}.

NC.Q: Was the total Online Sales Volume in 1985 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total online sales volume in 1985 was {higher} than in 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1987, was the average total Online Sales Volume higher or lower than between 1987 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total online sales volume between 1985 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1987 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1989, was the average total Online Sales Volume higher or lower than between 1986 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total online sales volume between 1984 and 1989 was {higher} than between 1986 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1993, was the average total Online Sales Volume higher or lower than between 1987 and 1989?
NC.A: The average total online sales volume between 1988 and 1993 was {lower} than between 1987 and 1989.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {International Customers} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did International Customers and Urban Shoppers first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: International Customers and Urban Shoppers first exchanged leading positions in {1984}.
